mn152:1.2: gajaṅgalāyaṃ → kajaṅgalāyaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); kajjaṅgalāyaṃ (sya-all, km) | suveḷuvane → mukheluvane (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); sukheluvane (si); veḷuvane (sya-all, km)
mn152:6.9: padumapalāse → paduminipatte (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | īsakampoṇe → īsakapoṇe (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); īsakaphaṇe (bj-a)
